q: its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., among its fiercest rival.

Kay Bailey Hutchison Kirsten Gillibrand of New York said in a statement Wednesday she's open to making improvements to the health care law, but the Republican repeal amendment amounted to`` a political stunt.'' It would deny affordable health insurance to millions of families and eliminate important tax breaks for small businesses, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` We should be focused on creating jobs, not refighting old political battles.''
